DOC.brief_summary: Aims study 1 . Effect daily weight change upto 7 day ICU admission outcome treatment 28 day 2 . Determination cut point maximum weight change outcome treatment
DOC.brief_title: Effect Body Weight Change Surgical ICU Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Study type : Prospective observational study Location : General surgical intensive care unit Inclusion criterion : All admission patient expect survive 24 hour Exclusion criterion : Patient die within 24 hour could weigh .
DOC.criteria: All admit ICU patient expect survive 24 hour All expect ICU patient survive less 24 hour All patient weigh .
